alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison and southeastern Hancock Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Diamondhead. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Lyman, Shoreline Park and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
